item.title: 20 Reasons Why AI Project Fails
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Why Does AI Project Fails?

I have been in IT project management for 2+ decades. Being in the industry for quite a good time, I have been observing the rise and fall of project success trends of different industries. In the last couple of years, I have observed some trends in AI projects and their failure rate. Based on my understanding I am trying to summarize the reasons for AI project failure. I am sure many of the points will resonate with you.Â
